_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Fabric
author: contact@awakenedredstone.com
description: Fabric Server. Fabric is a lightweight mod loader for Minecraft, with support for snapshots and fast updates to new versions.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Vanilla MC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

LATEST_MC_VERSION=$(curl https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/game | jq -r 'map(select(.stable == true)) | first.version')
LATEST_MC_SNAPSHOT_VERSION=$(curl https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/game | jq -r '.[0].version')

LATEST_LOADER_VERSION=$(curl https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader | jq -r 'map(select(.stable == true)) | first.version')
LATEST_INSTALLER=$(curl https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/installer | jq -r 'map(select(.stable == true)) | first')
LATEST_INSTALLER_VERSION=$(echo "$LATEST_INSTALLER" | jq -r ".version")
LATEST_INSTALLER_URL=$(echo "$LATEST_INSTALLER" | jq -r ".url")

echo -e "Latest MC version is $LATEST_MC_VERSION"
echo -e "Latest MC snapshot is $LATEST_MC_SNAPSHOT_VERSION"
echo -e "Latest loader version is $LATEST_LOADER_VERSION"
echo -e "Latest installer version is $LATEST_INSTALLER_VERSION"

if [ -z "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" ] || [ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  MC_VERSION=$LATEST_MC_VERSION
elif [ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" == "snapshot" ]; then
  MC_VERSION=$LATEST_MC_SNAPSHOT_VERSION
else
  MC_VERSION=$MINECRAFT_VERSION
fi

if [ -z "$FABRIC_VERSION" ] || [ "$FABRIC_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  LOADER_VERSION=$LATEST_LOADER_VERSION
else
  LOADER_VERSION=$FABRIC_VERSION
fi

if [ -z "$FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION" ] || [ "$FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  INSTALLER_VERSION=$LATEST_INSTALLER_VERSION
else
  INSTALLER_VERSION=$VANILLA_VERSION
fi

DOWNLOAD_URL="https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader/$MC_VERSION/$LOADER_VERSION/$INSTALLER_VERSION/server/jar"

echo -e "running: curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL"
curl -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "$DOWNLOAD_URL"

echo -e "Install Complete"

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of Minecraft to download. 

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the .jar file to run the server with.

variables.name: Fabric Version
variables.description: The version of FabricMC to use

variables.name: Fabric Installer Version
variables.description: The version of the Fabric Installer to use
